definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: I wanted Greenberg to be my pollster.
sentences.chinese: 我想让格林伯格做我的民意测验人。

sentences.english: A public-opinion poll is no substitute for thought.
sentences.chinese: 一个公开的民意测验无法代替思考。

sentences.english: Definitely, if a series of new polls are anything to go by.
sentences.chinese: 如果要经历一系列的民意测验，那么答案是肯定的。

sentences.english: We're conducting a poll among the children who have dropped out of school.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在退了学的学生中进行民意测验。

sentences.english: The pollsters, the politicians, the pundits got it wrong.
sentences.chinese: 民意测验，政治家，专家，全都弄错了。

sentences.english: Polls show that people today are less deferential to authority in organizations and politics.
sentences.chinese: 民意测验显示今天的人们较少顺从组织和政治的权威。

sentences.english: Kasparov's coalition barely registers in opinion polls.
sentences.chinese: 卡斯帕罗夫的联盟几乎在民意测验中看不到。

sentences.english: Polls show the majority of French are against the reforms.
sentences.chinese: 民意测验显示，大部分法国人反对这项改革。

sentences.english: One new poll says that a majority of people favor impeachment for President Bush.
sentences.chinese: 最近一项民意测验表示大多数民众支持弹劾布什总统。

sentences.english: Xia has likened the auction to an opinion poll.
sentences.chinese: 夏洪波将招标比作民意测验。

sentences.english: However, Foy said, the poll should beinterpreted with caution.
sentences.chinese: 但是，他说民意测验应谨慎解读。

sentences.english: To find out aBout the quality of this product, please read the puBlic - opinion poll .
sentences.chinese: 若要了解本产品的质量情况，请看产品民意测验结果。

sentences.english: Has led most national polls but is behind in early primary voting states.
sentences.chinese: 在民意测验中一路领先，但在初选州的支持率下降。

sentences.english: He dismisses the opinion polls as worthless.
sentences.chinese: 他认为民意测验毫无意义而不加考虑。

sentences.english: He understood the public's ambivalence, shown by every poll.
sentences.chinese: 他了解每次民意测验反映出来的公众的矛盾心理。

sentences.english: Polling organizations sampled the electorate at intervals.
sentences.chinese: 民意测验机关时时对选民进行抽样调查。

definition: to take part in an election/to run for office
Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
pinyin: Xi1 la1 li3 · Ke4 lin2 dun4

definition: Hillary (name)/Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
